DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot trial study well exercise intervention work prevent breast cancer come back postmenopausal breast cancer survivor . Regular exercise may able train body repair deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) efficiently respond inflammation proficiently , help prevent primary recurrent breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Intervention Preventing Breast Cancer Recurrence Postmenopausal Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To test hypothesis regular exercise increase DNA repair capacity . II . To test hypothesis regular exercise reduces inflammatory response . III . To test hypothesis regular exercise modulates telomerase activity . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess adherence study protocol . II . To examine difference body composition exercise intervention . III . To examine difference fitness exercise intervention . IV . To test hypothesis regular exercise increase quality life breast cancer survivor . V. To examine safety exercise intervention . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients participate supervise Curves exercise program three day week 16 week . The circuit-style workout consist 14 exercise construct pneumatic hydraulic resistance target oppose muscle group concentric-only fashion . Each session Curves facility include two complete circuit correspond exercise approximately 30 minute follow standardized stretching routine . ARM II : Patients participate formal exercise program 16 week . Patients offer Curves exercise intervention .
DOC.criteria: The study conduct woman diagnose first primary invasive estrogen receptor ( ER ) positive ( + ) breast cancer ( stage IIIIa ) within first 3 year posttreatment The study conduct postmenopausal woman Women childbearing potential men must agree use adequate contraception ( hormonal barrier method birth control abstinence ) prior study entry six month follow duration study participation ; woman become pregnant suspect pregnant participate trial , inform treat physician immediately Postmenopausal , define meeting follow criterion : Periods stop 6 month ago Bilateral oophorectomy Not already classified pre perimenopausal Started use hormone therapy menopausal symptom period stop , and/or Hysterectomy age 56 year age 56 year baseline Any body mass index ( BMI ) Sedentary ( participate regular exercise program past 12 month ) Nonsmokers ( smoke previous 12 month ) Willing able travel exercise facility Diagnosed first primary invasive ER+ breast cancer ( stage IIIIa ) Have undergone lumpectomy mastectomy Have complete adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiation within past 3 year prior study enrollment ( cytokine level predict high ) able initiate exercise program May use adjuvant endocrine therapy use continue duration study period All subject must ability understand willingness sign write informed consent History chronic disease include diabetes , uncontrolled hypertension thyroid disease Cardiovascular , respiratory musculoskeletal disease joint problem preclude moderate physical activity Regular , necessary use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) ( ask stop use study period ) Currently take postmenopausal hormone replacement therapy Stage IV distant metastatic disease Planned reconstructive surgery flap repair study period Subjects , opinion investigator , may able comply safety monitoring requirement study
